titleStmt.title: Notes taken in short-hand of a speech in the House of Lords on the debates of appointing a day for hearing Dr. Shirley's cause, Octob. 20, 1675
titleStmt.author: Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of, 1621-1683.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Shaftesbury. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Place and date of publication from NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
